name: Greedy City
description:
My submission to Blackthornprod game jam #3

This is a platformer where you collect coins. The more coins you have, the more thieves will try to steal them. However, if you don't collect any coins, you won't be able to buy weapons to defend yourself from the few that will appear.

Any feedback in general is appreciated, anything you don't like, anything you do, feel free to comment it (if you want), I am aware the game is full of bugs, but please tell me about any of them you can find.

Also sorry for the music sounding weird in the web version, that wasn't supposed to happen, I think unity messed something up, but it's entirely my fault for not leaving myself time to playtest the game.

Credits:

- Bfxr for the sound effects
